lead_paragraph: A gunman was apprehended after wounding a Miami Gardens police officer in a parked patrol vehicle in an ambush-style attack, the police said.

headline.print_headline: Florida: Man Held in Officer’s Ambush
headline.main: Florida: Man Held in Officer’s Ambush

snippet: A gunman was apprehended after wounding a Miami Gardens police officer in a parked patrol vehicle in an ambush-style attack, the police said.
abstract: Miami Gardens, Fla, police say David Andres Mejia was detained after wounding Police Officer David Starling in ambush-style attack.
